resources.string: Stop invading enemies to reach the portal by improving your One Tower with items and talents!
Each round all enemies get stronger. In turn you have to upgrade your tower by collecting resources like Gold, DIA (diamonds) and TP (talent points) in order to buy ITEMS or learn TALENTS.

Killed enemies give you Gold and have a chance to drop items. Items improve your towers attributes (e.g. tower damage or speed) but cost resources (e.g. Gold or DIA). Click on an item to see its attributes and costs.
Your tower can only use a certain amount of items at the same time. Remove unwanted items from the towers inventory by swiping UP.
To use an item simply swipe DOWN on it.

You receive
 - 1 TP (talent point) every 4 levels
 - 1 UP (upgrade point) every 5 levels

 You can spend TPs in the talents menu and UPs in the items tab.

One TD has a variety of different enemy types. Some have increased armor, some are super fast. Boss type enemies will spawn every 10 waves to challenge you! They come alone but have vastly increased attributes. You can check the whole list at the wiki page: Menu -> Wiki. \n \n Be prepared!

These basics will enable you to start exploring the rest of the game for yourself. 
 If you have further questions you can consult the wiki. 

Enjoy the game and good luck!
To get additional information about your tower attributes you can simply click on it! The attributes can be seen in the bottom right corner.
Want to know more about your enemies? Click on one to see enemy attributes in the bottom right corner.
To get back to the resources screen tap the icon on the bottom left.

Levels 1-9 : normal 
 each 10 levels: boss 
 levels 11+: random enemies 
 each 50 levels: challenge

Types 
normal: nothing special 
 armor: extra armor 
 magic armor: extra magic armor 
 speed: faster 
 hp regeneration: regenerating hitpoints 
 evade: % chance to evade attacks 
 split: split after being killed 
 immune: immune to movement impairment and debuffs 
 mass: more enemies 
 shortcut: take the shortest path 
 secondary: tank: more hp, armor, magic armor; is always focused 
 secondary: healer: heals random enemies

DMG: damage 
 SPD: attack speed 
 CRT: critical strike chance 
 CrtDmg: critical damage multiplier 
 HIT: hit chance 
 Gold: earned by killing enemies or interest 
 DIA: diamonds: earned by killing bosses 
 IP: item points: earned by collecting items, that are not being used 
 MP: mystery points: ???
Killing a "challenge" enemy will grant you 5 lives, 5 bombs and 1 bag slot. Leaking a challenge will not result in losing lives.
